tune.name: Hello, Goodb
tune.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
tune.content:
\relative f'' <<
  {
    \clef treble
    \key d \major
    \time 4/4

    \repeat volta 2 {
      \partial 4 d8 cis |
      d4 cis8 d e4 fis8 g |
      fis4 e d d8 cis |
      b8 cis d b cis d e cis |
      a2 a4 d8 cis |
      d4 cis8 d e4 cis |
      d2 d4
    } \break

    d8 cis |
    b4 fis8 b b4 fis8 b |
    b4 g8 b b4 g8 b |
    cis4 a8 cis cis4 a8 cis |
    cis4 ais8 cis cis4 ais8 cis |
    d4 b8 d d4 b8 d |
    e2.
    \bar "||" \break

    d8 cis |
    b4 fis8 b b4 fis8 b |
    b4 g8 b b4 g8 b |
    cis4 a8 cis cis4 a8 cis |
    cis4 ais8 cis cis4 ais8 cis |
    d4 cis8 d e4 cis |
    d2 d4
    \bar "|."
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      a4:7 |
      d2 a | d1 | g2 a | d a | d a:7 | d2.

      fis4:7 |
      b1:m | g | a | fis | b:m | a2.:7

      fis4:7 |
      b1:m | g | a | fis | d2 a:7 | d2.
    }
  }
>>
